name: copy-as-markdown
description: Copy Link or Image as Markdown code, a Web Extension

scripts.test:e2e: npm run compile && node scripts/build-test-extension.js && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run compile && node scripts/build-test-extension.js && playwright test --headed
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run compile && node scripts/build-test-extension.js && playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run compile && node scripts/build-test-extension.js && playwright test --debug
scripts.test:e2e:docker: docker build -t copy-as-markdown-playwright -f docker/playwright-ci/Dockerfile . && docker run --rm -it --ipc=host -p 9323:9323 copy-as-markdown-playwright
scripts.compile: npm run build:ts && npm run compile-chrome && npm run compile-firefox-mv2 && npm run compile-firefox-mv3
scripts.build-chrome: npm run compile-chrome && zip -r build/chrome.zip chrome/
scripts.build-firefox-mv2: npm run compile-firefox-mv2 && npx web-ext build -s firefox-mv2/ -a build/firefox-mv2/
scripts.build-firefox-mv3: npm run compile-firefox-mv3 && npx web-ext build -s firefox-mv3/ -a build/firefox-mv3/
